title: Are the Lunar Icons permanent at the shop?
body: I'm just wondering if they are permanent at the shop, if not when will they be unavailable to purchase? I couldn't find info on it. Thanks

replies.body: The icons will be available in the shop through February 9 18:59 AEDT. Check out the different sales and details on the [**Lunar Revel website**](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/skins-lunar-revel-2016/#/darkness)!
Also important to note, the one you can buy with IP and RP will only be available for RP once the event ends. If you want it, I'd grab it now.
IDK about NA but on OCE only one of the icons you can purchase is with IP, is that the same NA? (Its the Wukong one)
Yep, same on NA. They'll all be available for good after the event but that one (which you're using) is for IP also during the event only.
